sentences.english: Associating etiquette habit education is an important part of the foundation education.

sentences.english: Self evaluation can be divided into four layers.

sentences.english: College has the same task on pushing the media talents transformation.

sentences.english: Secondly, schools should carry out plans of education for students' all round development with equal attention of teaching and cultivating.

sentences.english: Student's noble sentiment in fosters in the education the flash.
